welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dayton, where small town charm meets big city excitement! Known for our rich aviation history and diverse cultural attractions, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Los Compadres
restaurants.description: Los Compadres is a mexican restaurant located in Dayton.

restaurants.name: Whataburger
restaurants.description: Whataburger is a american restaurant located in Dayton.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Dayton.

restaurants.description: Texas Seafood & Steakhouse Restaurant is a seafood restaurant located in Dayton.

restaurants.name: Jose's Mexican Restaurant
restaurants.description: Jose's Mexican Restaurant is a mexican restaurant located in Dayton.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is dedicated to domestic flights operated by Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is dedicated to domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport, serving all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
